word_mean: 投射，投影：向前投射，尤指物体在感觉器官上形成影象，可由此定出该目标的位置
也指大脑皮层和神经系统其他部分或特珠感觉器官之间的连结
突出：延伸或突出的动作或突出的部分
推诿：一种精神机制，将抑制的情结掩饰起来，认为是属于外部世界或其他人的

sentence.Network_en: The world of the gods is anthropomorphic, an imitative projection of ours.
sentence.Network_cn: 神界是拟人化的，是模仿我们人类世界的一个投影。

sentence.Network_en: They took me into a projection room to see a picture.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们把我带到放映室去看一张图。
她擅长舞台上的表情达意.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in sense 6): from Latin projectio(n-), from proicere 'throw forth' (see project)

entry.def: A projection is an estimate of a future amount.

example.ex: ...the company's projection of 11 million visitors for the first year.
example.tran: 公司对第一年将有1,100万游客的预测

entry.def: The projection of a film or picture is the act of projecting it onto a screen or wall.

example.ex: They took me into a projection room to see a picture.
example.tran: 他们把我带到放映室去看一张图。

means.word_mean: 1. a prediction made by extrapolating from past observations
2. the projection of an image from a film onto a screen
4. any structure that branches out from a central support
5. any solid convex shape that juts out from something
6. (psychiatry) a defense mechanism by which your own traits and emotions are attributed to someone else
7. the acoustic phenomenon that gives sound a penetrating quality;

sentences.sentence: "our ukuleles have been designed to have superior sound and projection"
"a prime ingredient of public speaking is projection of the voice"

means.word_mean: 8. the representation of a figure or solid on a plane as it would look from a particular direction
9. the act of projecting out from something
10. the act of expelling or projecting or ejecting

stems_affixes.word_buile: ab离开+ject抛→抛掉→可怜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 形容词的,用作形容词的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
deject[v.使沮丧, 使灰心]+ed表形容词→adj.沮丧的,失望的
object[n.物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语 v.[to]反对]+ive……的→客观的[词性变化:作名词,表示"目标,目的"]
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题
ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
eject[v.投出,掷出]+ion表名词→n.喷出, 排出物
inter在……中间+ject投掷,扔+ion表名词→在句子中间扔出的字→感叹词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语
stems_affixes.word_buile: ob逆,反+ject投掷,扔→反着扔→反对→引申为扔向目标

stems_affixes.value_cn: [to]反对,异议,不喜欢,反对的理由
stems_affixes.word_buile: object反对+ion表名词→n.[to]反对,异议,不喜欢,反对的理由
object[n.物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语 v.[to]反对]+ive……的→客观的[词性变化:作名词,表示"目标,目的"]
pro向前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ile物体→向前扔的物体
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ion表名词→n.射出,投射;计划
re回+ject扔回来→拒绝
reject[v.拒绝,抵制,丢弃,排斥,退掉 n.落选者]+ion表名词→n.退回,拒绝
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题
subject[n.主题;学科 adj.隶属的;易遭..的 v.使隶属]+ion表名词→n.征服
subject主观+ivity表名词→n.主观性, 主观
tra穿+ject投掷,扔+ory范围→扔出去穿过的范围→弹道轨道
con共同+ject投掷,扔+ure表名词→大家一起扔[思想]→推测
de向下+ject投掷,扔→情绪向下扔→沮丧
e出+ject掷→掷出
in进入+ject投掷,扔→扔进去→注射
ob逆,反+ject投掷,扔→反着扔→反对→引申为扔向目标
pro向前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目

stems_affixes.value_cn: 拒绝,抵制,丢弃,排斥,退掉
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+ject扔回来→拒绝

Sentence.sentence: By 2075, the United Nations' mid-range projection for global population is about 9.5 billion.
Such a projection presents mankind with wide-ranging social, economic, environmental and political issues that need to be addressed today to ensure a sustainable future for all

sentences.en: The council has revised its projections of funding requirements upwards.
sentences.cn: 地方议会调高了对资金需求的预测。

sentences.en: He declined to make projections about the next quarter’s earnings.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝对下一季度的盈利作出预测。

sentences.en: On current projections, there will be more than ten million people 65 or over in 2010.
sentences.cn: 根据当前的预测，2010 年65 岁或以上的人口将超过1 千万。
